pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.4: “yatheva mayaṃ sapajāpatikā nāvāya kīḷāma, evamevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya nāvāya kīḷantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.11: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya, uddhaṅgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.3: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.5: “Na, bhaginī, kappati bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhituṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.6: tumhe vā paṭhamaṃ uttaratha mayaṃ vā uttarissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.9: Atha kho tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pacchā uttarantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsu ca dūsesuñca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.10: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.14: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.15: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya uddhaṅgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā, aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.10: “abhiruhāma, bhagini, abhiruhāmāyya; abhiruhāmāyya, abhiruhāma, bhagini; ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā abhiruhāmā”ti saṃvidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.11: Bhikkhuniyā abhiruḷhe bhikkhu abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.12: Bhikkhumhi abhiruḷhe bhikkhunī abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.20: Kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.21: Agāmake araññe, aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.1: Saṃvidahite saṃvidahitasaññī ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā, aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.2: Saṃvidahite vematiko ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā, aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.3: Saṃvidahite asaṃvidahitasaññī ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā, aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.4: Bhikkhu saṃvidahati, bhikkhunī na saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
